QuestData.Title: Purging the Defilers
QuestData.Description:
Azshara always did need everything to be about her. Everything had to have her name on it. Everything was for her glory. She forgot our people's connection to Elune. Or perhaps she believed it did not matter?
Azshara and her minions have too long defiled this place with their heresy.
Let us show them Elune's vengeance.
